mendedminecarts.accurate_client_minecart: Runs the same minecart movement code on the client as on the server. Currently only in singleplayer worlds.
mendedminecarts.no_cart_interpolation.de: Disables the client interpolation capability. Instead position packets set the client side cart position like with other entities.
mendedminecarts.always_sync_cart_positio: Server sends the minecart position to the client every tick.
mendedminecarts.display_cart_position.de: Client displays the last received minecart position.
mendedminecarts.custom_cart_speed.descri: Sets minecarts to a custom speed limit when on rails.
mendedminecarts.display_cart_data.veloci: Displays the velocity vector above minecarts.
Displays the absolute velocity above minecarts.
mendedminecarts.display_cart_data.fill_l: Displays the fill level of storage minecarts above them.
mendedminecarts.display_cart_data.on_gro: Displays whether minecarts are on ground above them
mendedminecarts.display_cart_data.in_wat: Displays whether minecarts are touching water (client side). Requires accurate client minecarts.
mendedminecarts.display_cart_data.slowdo: Displays the slowdown rate of minecarts (client side)
mendedminecarts.display_cart_data.estima: Displays an estimate of the distance the minecart can travel with the current velocity and slowdown rate
mendedminecarts.rotate_cart_to_rail.desc: Rotates minecarts on non-curved rails to fix unexpected pushing behavior of minecarts
